Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '(Shoots the guard leaping toward you) The guards are still on us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: '(Opens up the head and removes its central system) It... wants to talk to Nanami.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We don't have time! The guards are going to have us...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's no longer under Nat's control after the power system failed. Please let me take its brain!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Nanami! What... did that guard say to you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "(Connects to the guard's brain) The power system is falling apart... more guards will be freed soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nat... before she was refitted into a Construct, she was Dominik's lieutenant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Why does this guard know Nat's history?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "It was one of Nat's royal guards.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Nanami! Hold it tight, and don't lose it! It's still valuable to us...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We can't go back the same way now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sync our plan of retreat with Bianca and Karenina.', 3: '52'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "From where we're standing, Nat's guards have us surrounded. We're running out of escape routes...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Nat has thought it through. Once they close in, we'll have to pick a direction and run...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "(Aims upward) I can't think of a route that makes more sense currently...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant contacted Kamui after comms was back. He's been in the channel this whole time...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Right, right... I've been listening, alright... Busy here... Complicated... retreat... hold on...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Escape route... Don't worry about me... I'm too far from you guys. I'm still at the engines... Situation here... hard to explain in a few words...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'll find my way out of here... Protect the commandant, take care of yourselves... I'm the strongest Construct here after all... Don't worry about me... (laughs)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Bianca, continue to move up with Karenina...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're right behind you. Escape route—the top of the Golden Vortex...", 4: '1'}
